Package com.pushwords.dao

Class WordGroupDao

java.lang.Object
com.pushwords.dao.WordGroupDao
public class WordGroupDao extends Object
WordGroupDao handles database operations related to the WordGroup entity.

    • findGroupListByUserId

      public List<WordGroup> findGroupListByUserId(Integer userId)
      Finds a list of word groups by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose word groups are to be found
      Returns:
      a list of WordGroup objects corresponding to the user ID

    • findWordCountByGroupId

      public long findWordCountByGroupId(String groupId)
      Finds the count of words in a specific group by group ID.
      Parameters:
      groupId - the ID of the group
      Returns:
      the count of words in the specified group

    • deleteGroupById

      public int deleteGroupById(String groupId)
      Deletes a word group from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      groupId - the ID of the group to be deleted
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the delete operation

    • checkGroupName

      public Integer checkGroupName(String groupName, Integer userId, String groupId, String groupDescription)
      Checks if a group name already exists for a user. Returns 1 if the group name is unique or matches the current group, otherwise returns 0.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group
      userId - the ID of the user
      groupId - the ID of the group to be checked
      groupDescription - the description of the group
      Returns:
      1 if the group name is unique or matches the current group, otherwise 0

    • addGroup

      public Integer addGroup(String groupName, Integer userId, String groupDescription)
      Adds a new word group to the database.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group
      userId - the ID of the user
      groupDescription - the description of the group
      Returns:
      the generated key for the new group, or null if the operation failed

    • updateGroup

      public Integer updateGroup(String groupName, String groupId, String groupDescription)
      Updates an existing word group in the database.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group
      groupId - the ID of the group
      groupDescription - the description of the group
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the update
